lead_paragraph: Mr. Holbrooke’s widow, Kati Marton, discusses why he kept a secret diary and why he stayed in the Obama administration despite his disagreements.

headline.main: Richard Holbrooke’s Diary of His Diplomacy
headline.print_headline: Richard Holbrooke’s Diary of His Diplomacy

snippet: Mr. Holbrooke’s widow, Kati Marton, discusses why he kept a secret diary and why he stayed in the Obama administration despite his disagreements.
